item.description:
Hi again,

We have three tee times: 2:10, 2:20 and 2:30

This is based on three foursome groups.

I'll be at the Pro/Golf Shop by 1:30 to meet and greet. I think we should all meet as close to 1:30 as possible to sort out who's grouping up with who.

I'll leave the rest of the description for price and website referral.

This one's a bit pricey: $76 for 18 holes (cart included).

and the website is as follows: http://www.butterbroo...

See everyone on Saturday and call me if you have any questions,

Jon

617-519-4141
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have that "Boston MetroWest Group" sign. :)
item.why: It's the first day of Summer !

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Butter Brook Golf Club
